title: First Rift awful loss fail
body:
I almost exclusively play aram.  I want to go back and try to get better at rift.  Dont know what champ to try or anything.  I have Malz at Rank 4 so I try him mid.  4/11/4 with only 68 cs in 25 mins.  Team kills 45-16.  It was weird because I haven't played Rift much since the days that mid was only rangy mages.  I was facing a Yasuo and a Roaming Xayah.  It was an awful experience.  I don't even know where to start to improve upon it.  
Advice?

replies.body:
Play rift more. You just need experience. 4/11 is also not out of the ordinary for a bad game.

ARAM is a zero-skill, zero-effort, zero-teamwork environment where people run down lane and die and refuse to defend, group up or init properly (i play ARAM a lot lately, pardon the frustration). You just need to get used to actually having to think about your team and vision by way of experience.

TY my second game went way better.  I played Voli bot support to Yasuo.  My flip actually synced with yas super well.  I didnt have a sparkling Kda but I had 19 assists, the most on the team.  Maybe I need to stick to support or top?

>  Yasuo

Sounds like you also have little to no normals ELO, going to take a while for matchmaking to stabilize.
